inn1.comm: he doesn't chase this wide one first up and earns an extra for a wide
he corrects the line immediately and bowls this one straight on the middle stumps line, the batsman defends it to midwicket
here comes that swing from Kula, Sharjeel throws his bat at that as it was going away from him and gets a thick outside edge to third man
he comes forward and defends the inswinger back to the bowler
he stays in the crease and punches it firmly to mid-off
again, prefers to stay in the crease as he defends this length delivery to mid-on
no swing this time for Kula, the batsman defends it easily off the back foot to mid-off
he goes full first ball, but the line is wrong and it's on the pads. Sharjeel doesn't waste any time and flicks it behind square on the leg side with ease. No half measures from the youngster
he shortens the length, but the line is again on the pads and Sharjeel flicks it to the right of fine leg for a couple
there is an appeal for lbw as the batsman misses his flick, but the replays show that there was a huge inside edge on that.

cramps him for room with an angled delivery, but the bowler appeals and he gets the decision in his favour. Sharjeel has gone to review that.  The appeal sounded a bit strange to the naked eye as it seemed he had hit it with the bat, but the replays show that it has flicked the front pad before the bat. The batsman was stuck in the crease. The ball hit the pad in line with stumps, but there is a question about height. It is hitting the top of middle and Pakistan have lost their review. Good tight decision by the umpire though. Sharjeel falls early after an impressive innings in the last game.
starts off with a good ball on the middle and off line, but he has overstepped
well there is not much Hafeez can do as this one is fired on his toes. The Professor blocks it out towards square leg for a couple
this one is just outside off and Hafeez lets it go through without any fuss
he starts off with an inswinger that is defended easily by Shehzad
length delivery outside off, the batsman shuffles across the stumps and defends it to midwicket
too much swing on this one and it goes down the leg side. Sanga dives across and gets a hand to it, but parries it to fine leg
he stays in the crease and punches this one to cover, straight to the fielder
he stays solid on the back foot and punches this one nicely through the gap at cover for three runs
keeps it in the channel outside off, the batsman comes forward and shoulders arms
another teaser outside off and Hafeez doesn't take the bait, lets it go through
full and swinging away outside off, Shehzad takes a confident stride and defends it to cover
almost gets dragged into playing at this outswinger, but just pulls his bat away at the last moment
length delivery outside off, the batsman shuffles across and gets solidly behind that in defence
he gets squared up with this length delivery on off stump and gets a thick outside edge to third man
good tight delivery outside off, Hafeez comes forward and gets on top of that, opening the face to guide it to third man
he comes forward and drives the full delivery to the fielder at cover
a sloppy misfield at cover allows a single to Hafeez after he had softly punched this towards the fielder
he comes forward and drives it confidently, but straight to the fielder at mid-off
he stands tall and punches this one through square on the off side, but there is a deep point in place who cuts it off
he is beaten as he tries to cut one that is too close
he gets to swing this one sharply into the batsman and hits him on the thigh pad
he stays in the crease and solidly defends the back of length delivery to the off side
he comes forward and slices his drive past the diving point fielder for a single
good tight delivery just outside off, it had a bit of a shape on it and it hit the batsman high on his bat as he came forward to defend
another full delivery outside off and this one is swinging away too, the batsman comes forward and drives it to mid-off
slightly back of length this time and Hafeez comfortably defends it to the off side
short ball on the body and it's played well by Hafeez as he pulls it along the ground to fine leg
Dilshan at point dives to his right to make a good stop after Shehzad had played a sliced drive to a full delivery
he flicks this one off his hips and manages to beat the fielder at square leg. The outfield is a bit heavy but the ball teases the fielder before hitting the rope
he stays in the crease and defends the length delivery solidly to the off side
he shuffles across and tries to defends this to the leg side, but inside edges it on to his pads
he stands tall and punches this one firmly, but finds the fielder at cover
he stays in the crease and defends the length delivery to cover
another good delivery from Kula, Hafeez comes forward and patiently defends this down the pitch
bowls a 133 kph delivery wide outside off which is easily left alone by the batsman
oh he chases this wide one again without getting anywhere close to it, misses and it just flies past the outside edge
stands tall and punches this one to the third-man fielder. Perera still bowling a bit wide outside off
that was beautifully punched off the back foot by Hafeez, but it's hit straight to point
good leave by Hafeez, but this one was close to off stump
oh beautifully hit this time! He takes a big positive stride and drives it on the up through covers. No chance for anyone to stop that
length delivery outside off, Shehzad comes forward and drives it to mid-off
he keeps bowling a tight line around off stump, the batsman shows respect and defends it solidly
now he comes down the pitch, but is only able to punch it to mid-on as the bowlers pulls the length back
back of length by Kula and again, Shehzad find mid-on with his back foot punch

huge mix-up but Shehzad survives! Shehzad pushed it past the stumps and started scurrying for a single straightaway, but Hafeez was unmoved. The fielder at mid-on did well to cut it off and quickly flick a throw back, but Shehzad turned back in time
he charges down the pitch and gets a thick inside edge down to fine leg
too straight from Perera this time and the batsman easily punches it through midwicket for a couple of runs
sweetly timed by Shehzad, but he finds the fielder at cover with his one-the-up drive
more solid batsmanship form Shehzad as he confidently comes forward to the length ball and punches it to mid-off
he squeezes this between the point and the cover point fielder with a woody punch. Just timing on that one, but it slows down towards the boundary
back of length delivery on off stump, climbs a touch extra as the batsman defends it towards mid off
oh he has seen enough of Perera! This one is stylishly lofted over mid-off and bounces once before hitting the ropes. Just a clean swing of the bat in that one
and he is flicked easily behind square for a couple of runs
he bowls a back of length delivery on off stump and the batsman defends it comfortably to point
too straight from Mathews, this is easily whipped to deep midwicket for a single
stays in the crease and whips the back of length delivery past midwicket for another easy single
he comes solidly behind the line and defends the length delivery back to the bowler
another one on off stump, the batsman defends it to midwicket off the front foot
bowled on a good length on off and middle, defended on the front foot
nudged off the front foot to the leg side this time
flatter ball and the line is down leg side, played off the pads to short fine leg
did that carry back to the bowler? Hafeez came forward and chipped it back to Prasanna, it was low but it definitely carried. That's a chance that's been dropped
an lbw appeal after Hafeez misses the forward defence but that was sliding down leg
defended on the front foot on the leg side
he keeps finding fielders with this beautiful shots! This one was hit on the up, but straight to the cover fielder
stays int the crease and flicks it to short fine leg for a quick single! A direct hit would have made that interesting as Hafeez had to stretch to complete the run
he waits in the crease and chops the length delivery to point
stays in the crease and whips it from outside off to deep midwicket for a single to bring up the team's fifty
another one flicked from off stump to the leg side, this time it's behind square and they pick up a couple
a misfield at midwicket almost allows an extra run, but the batsman were comfortably going for the single anyway
nice loop from the bowler and Shehzad defends this off the front foot
another loopy delivery on off and the batsman gets an inside edge towards midwicket as he looks to defend
he comes forward and drives this full delivery to long off for a single
he comes down the pitch, but the bowler pushes this one wide outside off and Hafeez has to defend
quicker delivery sliding down the leg side and Hafeez deflects it fine on the leg side for a couple
he comes forward and pushes this one to the off side
the bowler saw the batsman charging out of the crease and so pitched it short and aimed it at the body. The batsman has to hop and defend it to off
he comes forward and pushes this one to long on for a single
pounds this one midway on the pitch and it sails over the batsman's head as he sways out of line
he tries to come out of the crease, but there is no room to pull and he gets hit on the thigh pad
another short of length delivery and another attempted pull, this time he gets bat on it as he plays it towards fine leg to bring up the half-century of the partnership
trie to dominate again by charging down the pitch and punches it straight past the non striker to long on
he moves well outside the leg stump and tries to drive this one inside out, but again finds the cover fielder
again, he stands way outside leg and has to stretch to reach this delivery as he plays it to point
full and flighted, this time he drives it down the pitch, but the bowler makes a good diving save
he tries to drive it though off, but gets an inside edge to midwicket
this time he pushes it softly towards the right of the cover point fielder for a single
he takes a big forward stride an eases this loopy delivery to deep extra cover for a single
he works the back of length delivery to the leg side and there is some more confusion in the running between the wickets as Hafeez is sent back

what a stupendous catch is that! Perera has pulled off a blinder and the umpires want to check that one. Here is what happened - Shehzad shuffled across the crease and wanted to ramp it over the short fine leg fielder, but it came a little slow and all the batsman could do was lap it up towards the left of that fielder. Perera was a little slow to spot that, but he came forward and dived to his left to pull it just above the turf with his extended left hand. They are checking the reviews and you know how it looks when they check the reviews..They are zooming it in and checking to see if the fielder got his finders underneath the ball in time.. But the more you check the replays, the more doubt appears..And they turn it down.. Shehzad survives
tries to bowl a slower delivery, but looses the line and pushes it down the leg side. What more, Sanga misses a regulation stop and allows an extra run
he stays in the crease and clips the length delivery behind square on the leg side to pick up two quick runs
he waits in the crease and opens the face to defend it to point
he bowls a short of length delivery on off, the batsman defends off the back foot
oh another leading edge and it is just out of reach of Perera diving to his right hand side
the batsman goes deep in his crease and nudges it through square leg for a single
flatter and straighter on the middle stump line, defended to midwicket
floated outside off stump and Hafeez plays it late towards backward point, where the fielder makes a hash of it and allows extra runs
he stays on the back foot and whips it through midwicket for a single
he charges down the pitch, but he is not to the pitch of the delivery and defends it to the bowler
he comes forward and defends the flighted delivery to the leg side
little width outside off and Shehzad cuts it hard to the right of third man for a couple of runs
comes well outside off and plays a smart short-arm pull through backward square leg. That sped away to the boundary
he stands tall and pushes this to mid on
length delivery on off stump, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
moves well outside leg stump to create room and punches it on the up to deep cover
short and well down the leg side, all the batsman has to do is to get some bat on it. He does well by deflecting it to the fine leg boundary
this one slides across the batsman from round the wicket and beats the bat, Shehzad pushes inside the line
short delivery and the batsman misses out as he slaps this straight to Dilshan at midwicket. That was a boundary ball
he corrects the length this time and Shehzad can only defend
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to deep cover for a single
quicker delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it to midwicket

this time he nudges it past the midwicket fielder and calls for the second! But hello hello, where was the second in that? The fielder was charging from the deep and was on to it in a flash, fires in a good throw at the striker's end and Hafeez is nowhere in the frame. Someone predicted earlier it was going to be a run out and it is..A waste of a wicket
he drives this one easily to long on for a single
he bowls a back of length delivery on the stumps, 111 kph, defended back to the bowler
this time he eases it to long off for a single
he waits for this one and opens the face very late to guide it fine on the off side for a couple of runs
he walks well across the stumps and clips the full delivery easily to deep backward square leg
he comes forward and drives it easily to deep extra cover for a single
tossed up on the stumps, easily driven to long on for a single
oh that's nicely driven over the infield! It was full and he goes inside out to find the boundary at extra cover, there was no one there
smartly fielded by Senanayake at midwicket, preventing a certain single
full and quick, the batsman drives it straight to cover
on the pads and it's easily clipped to deep backward square leg for a single
he comes forward and pushes the flatter delivery to cover
pushes this one down the leg side and is called a wide
it's dabbed towards the cover and the batsmen scamper through for a quick single
he stretches forward and drives the full delivery to extra cover
nicely driven off the front foot by Maqsood, but he finds the fielder at extra cover
another shot played towards cover, no runs
this time he manages to push it to deep cover for a single
full and tossed up, now Shehza finds that man at extra cover with his drive
he tries to push it down straight, but the bat turns in his hands and the ball is pushed to deep midwicket. 100 for Pakistan
he comes forwards and eases it to long off
dabbed to the right of point for an easy single
floated up on off, Shehzad wanted a single with a dab to point, but Maqsood sends him back.. He dives back to get in the crease
he gets his fifty this time with a quiet nudge to deep midwicket
defends this one from the crease towards cover
flighted on the leg stump and the batsman tickles it to short fine leg for a single
skips out of the crease, but defends it back to the bowler
he pushes this one to long off for a single
oh he stands well outside leg stump and cuts it late from infront of the middle stump for a couple of runs
down the leg side and Shehzad again misses on some runs, sweeping it straight to short fine leg
stands tall and punches the flatter delivery to long on
he comes down the pitch and pushes it softly to mid-off for a quick single
another quick single as Maqsood dabs it towards points and calls early
on the pads and Shehzad fails to find a single, pushes it to midwicket
moves well outside leg and drives it inside out to deep cover for a single
comes down the pitch, but can only push it back to the bowler
bowls that other one and the batsman squeezes it to deep cover for a single
he works it away to deep midwicket easily for a single
he goes deep in his crease and punches it to long on for a single
he charges down the pitch and whacks it wide of long on, but finds the fielder
this time he sweeps it powerfully behind square, boundary comes finally
he makes room and slices it to short third man for a single
woooow! That's a huge hit! It was tossed up and he got well under it, lofting it easily over long on and deep into the stands
he waits in the crease and cuts it to deep point for a single
quicker and flatter on off stump, the batsman comes forward and defends
another accurate delivery on the middle stump line, defended back down the pitch
full and on the middle stump, the batsman wanted to play it to the leg side, but ends up pushing it back to the bowler
full delivery on off, he dabs it to cover and calls for a quick single
he comes down the pitch, but Sena shortens the length. Shehzad manages to just push it back to the bowler
flatter and quicker on off, the batsman cuts it straight to short third man

he has holed out at the cow corner! Wonderful running catch by Chandimal! It was a long hop and probably didn't bounce as high as the batsman would have liked to. He was trying to send this into the stands but gets it off the bottom of the bat. It sails high and gives the fielder time to run around from long on and get under it
he comes forward and dabs it to the right of point for a single
well well well, Misbah is in no mood to do tuk tuk, he goes for a reverse paddle and plays it well, fine on the off side for three runs
attempts a full blooded sweep shot, but the length is full and the line is heading down the leg side, he misses and it rolls behind the keeper for the batsmen to pick up a single
he comes forward and dabs the full delivery to cover for a single
loud appeal by Sanga for a catch down the leg side. The umpire is not moved, but the bowler has managed to get away with the wide
full delivery on off, it's whipped straight to midwicket
he goes deep in his crease and nudges it to square leg for a single
he comes down the pitch and tries to push it to off, but gets an inside edge to midwicket
he tries to clear the infield on off side, but ends up slicing it behind point for a couple
that has been given a proper thwack! He came down the pitch and got well under it to power it to the deep midwicket boundary
he comes forward and defends the tossed up delivery to midwicket
an appeal for lbw as Misbah tries to paddle it from outside off, but there was gloves involved in that
this time he manages to paddle it fine and picks up a couple
tossed up outside off, Misbah pushes it easily to deep cover for a single
gives the batsman room with his legspinner and Shehzad punches it to deep cover for a single
he pressers forward and defends it solidly
he gets some width this time and takes full toll, cutting it between point and short third man for another boundary
he comes down the pitch too early and gives the bowler time to adjust and bowl at his pads
he shuffles across and works it away to square leg for a single
he goes deep in his crease to defend this back to the bowler
tries to push it to long on but the bowler dives across the stop that
he dabs it to cover and picks up a quick single
he comes forward and presents full face of the bat in defence
this time he goes back and pushes it to long on for a single
moves well outside leg and wanted to blast this through cover, but gets a thick outside edge that is pulled back by the short third man fielder
tries to distract the bowler by moving around the crease, but defends it to off in the end
more defence from Misbah, this one is pushed back to the bowler
full and tossed up, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
he goes on the back foot and pulls this in the air towards deep midwicket, a single as it drops short of the fielder in the deep
goes for the reverse paddle too early and misses it outside off. Misbah and Sena exchange smiles
tossed up on the stumps, he defends it to off
flatter and on the stumps, defended towards midwicket now
shorter this time and Misbah nudges it to short fine for a single
quicker delivery on off and Shehzad can only push it back to the bowler
he wanted to send this into the stands with a slog sweep, but gets an under edge to deep square leg
flatter delivery, pushed back to the bowler

chips it over the short cover fielder and comes back for a second. Sanga fakes a take and tries to whip the bails, Shehzad thinks he is in trouble and dives.. But the ball arrives much later.. Sanga has a cheeky smile on his visage after that trick..
tries to find the boundary at extra cover, but straight to the fielder there
tossed up delivery, he stretches forward and defends
full and flighted, Shehzad picks up a single to deep cover and it's time for drinks
slower delivery on the stumps, Shehzad dabs it towards midwicket for a single
it's a yorker on the leg stump and Misbah calmly flicks it to fine leg for a single
bowls a slower delivery on the leg stump, but Shehzad had already made room. He pushes it to long on for a single
another full delivery down the leg side, another Misbah flick sends it to fine leg
he makes room again, but gets another slower delivery that he pushes to long on
on the toes this one, not much you can do with those. Misbah blocks it out to midwicket
it's only slightly short but Shehzad was ready and pulls it in front of square. It's pulled in by the fielder in the deep though
slower delivery on the pads, the batsman pushes it to midwicket for a single
he walks across the stumps and eats away the room, just pushes it back to the bowler
full delivery on off, Misbah whips it to midwicket for another single
full delivery on the stumps, Shehzad drives, but still can't find the gap, hit straight to extra cover
full and on the stumps, and again to that man at extra cover. He takes a single, but Sri Lanka wouldn't mind them
full on off stump, Shehzad slices it, but picks up the point fielder with amazing accuracy..
slower delivery on the pads and this time Shehzad picks up a couple after working it away behind square on the leg side
another full delivery and another push to extra cover for a single
marginally off his length and Misbah just chips it over the bowler's head without any fuss. Not much power, just enough timing to send it to the boundary. Smartly done
now Misbah flicks the yorker to the left of fine leg fielder to pick up the second
a good yorker by Malinga, not much that could be done with those. Misbah jams it out to long on for a single
a low full toss on the pads and the batsman should be disappointed he pushed that straight to midwicket, that deserved to be hit for more
tries a slower ball, but it's a slow full toss that is dragged to the cow corner.. Still, only a couple
full delivery on the off stump, Shehzad punches it to long off for a single
another one on the block hole and Misbah can only push it as far as wide mid on
he flicks it to deep midwicket and picks up a single again
he bowls a good yorker on off, Misbah can only pick up a single to midwicket
gets one to turn and hit the pad, but that was spinning down the leg side. Sanga appeals and appeals.. but that would have missed the leg stump easily
he comes forward and dabs it to square leg for a single
full delivery on the stumps, the batsman dabs it to the leg side, but the bowler runs through to prevent the single
he moves to 98 with a nudge to deep midwicket off the backfoot
he waits in the crease and tucks it to square leg for a single
now moves to 99 with a push to deep midwicket. He wanted a second, but Misbah sent him back rightly
he pulls the short ball comfortably to fine leg to get to his fourth ODI century and his second within a month. Shehzad starts celebrating before completing his run, Misbah embraces him ...
full delivery on off, Misbah drives it down the ground to long off for a single
slower delivery on a length, Shehzad pushes it straight to the extra cover fielder
he goes down on the ground as the yorker hits him on the boot. Misbah runs across and Shehzad gets up and hobbles across the complete the run..
full and on off stump, Misbah squeezes this through the gap at cover for three runs
another one on the blockhole and Shehzad jogs across after pushing it to wide mid off
he waits in the crease and whips it to square leg for a single
another dab to midwicket for a single
he steps out of the crease and punches it to long on for a single
quicker delivery on the stumps, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
steps out early, the bowler bowls it very short, the batsman pullls, but doesn't get much power behind that as he hits it to deep square leg
chips it over the infield to deep cover
he gets the outside edge this time, but the ball dies as it goes towards the keeper. Malinga thought he had his man, but Sanga shakes his head as it had just bounced before landing in his gloves
full delivery on the pads and this is as well timed a flicks as any by Shehzad, he whipped it to deep midwicket. One bounce, another one and then to the boundary
length delivery and the batsman swings his bat, chips it over the bowler's head, but it doesn't go all the way
now Misbah shows how it's done! It's a full delivery on the middle stump, he swings and gets it off the middle, sends it way over the sight screen.. Powerful hit that one
full delivery on off, Misbah whips it to wide long on for a single
full and on the base of off stump, the batsman digs it out to long on
moves outside leg stump and goes for a powerful sweep, but doesn't get hold of it.. A single to deep square leg
he didn't attempt to play a shot thinking that was slipping down the leg side, but it hits his pads.
another one down the leg side, Misbah wanted to sweep, he missed, it flicked his pads and it rolled to fine leg
he charges down the pitch, is nowhere near the pitch of the delivery, but goes through with the shot anyway, lofting it over mid-off for a boundary
skips out again and inside edges it to behind square on the leg side to pick up a couple
tries to paddle it fine, but gets a top edge over the keeper for a single
tries for a yorker, but it's a low full toss that is chipped over the bowler's head for a couple
he gets hold of this full delivery as he tries to smash it down the ground, but he is running out of juice, i feel, as that is cut off by the long on fielder
another full delivery is driven firmly down the ground, but straight to long on
oh that's the best yorker of all! Swinging in and aimed right at the base of middle stump. Misbah digs it out to midwicket and smiles to acknowledge the quality of that
another good yorker, Shehzad jams it on the crease, but calls for a single anyway
and another yorker! the batsman pushes it back to the bowler

oh that is the end of Shehzad! He was trying to flick the yorker fine by shuffling across the stumps and he missed it.. It hit the front pad and would have crashed on to off and middle. A good innings by Shehzad comes to an end..
length delivery is flicked to deep square leg for a single
now Kula bowls a good yorker that is blocked to midwicket. Misbah was happy with one, but Afridi calls him back for a second
another yorker, dug out to deep midwicket for a single
a slower bouncer that Afridi lets go, the umpire is ok with that ball though
and he follows it up with a yorker that is blocked out to mid on
full, but not quite a yorker and Afridi crashes it straight to the cover fielder
that's a poor delivery at this stage, it's way down the leg side and Sanga does well to stop that
corrects his line and bowls his regular delivery that is jammed out to long on
he is on it now! The yorker was just off from the correct length and Afridi goes deep into the crease to power it over long-on, where Dilshan gets a hand to it, but just parries it over the line..
he jams that yorker out with some force as that runs away quickly to deep midwicket
another yorker, marginally off target though, and Misbah whips it easily to deep backward square leg boundary to over take Virat Kohli in ODI run getters list this year..
full and on off, he calmly tickles it to fine leg to get to his 34th ODI  half-century - his 14th this year
a good yorker and Lala can just squeeze it out to square leg
moves well outside leg and gets a slower delivery, he slaps it to deep midwicket for a couple
a full delivery on off, this time Misbah can only push it back to the bowler
too full, too wide, it's an extra down the leg side
good bowling by Kula as he bowls it full and Misbah drives it back to him
he takes it on the full and drives it firmly to long on
outrageous shot for only two! It was a short delivery and the batsman plays an upper cut over the short third man fielder. The ball though stops in the outfield
he walks well down the pitch and thwacks the full delivery to deep midwicket
wow, what was that! Lala goes down on his knee early to sweep Malinga's yorker, but that was wide outside off, so he changes his shot at the last moment and opens the face to run it down the off side
length delivery and he doesn't get hold of it, gets a thick inside edge to deep square leg
another good yorker by Malinga, it's dug out to cover for a single
another yorker, it's dug out to midwicket for a single
low full toss on the pads and he picks out the man at deep midwicket.. Also keeps the strike
slower and shorter! This one just gave Lala loads of time to line himself up and whack it high and handsome over deep midwicket
full and wide down the leg side
Lala gets a low full toss and he whacks it in the gap at deep midwicket, another boundary
this one's a yorker on leg stump and he guides it to fine leg for a single
low full toss, it's hammered down the ground for a single and Lala gets the strike for the last ball
full and on the middle stump line and Sahibzada Mohammad Shahid Khan Afridi can only hit it for a single to long on. It's also the half-century of the partnership
the innings ends with another single to long on and Pakistan have made it past 280..

inn2.comm: tossed up delivery on off, defended off the front foot
flatter this time, another front foot defensive shot
steps out of the crease and pushes it to mid-on for a single
full and flighted, it's eased to long on for a single
quicker delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it solidly
balls it with a little pause but KJP chops it to point for a quick single
he comes forward and defends the length delivery to point
thumps it on the up but finds the man at mid-on with that shot
stays in the crease and defends the length delivery solidly to point again
he doesn't come forward again and slices it in the air to third man for a single
length delivery on the stumps, comes in a touch into the batsman, who pushes it to the right of mid on for a single
oh wow! That is whacked with some intent to mid-off for no runs
full and flighted, pushed back to the bowler
only just drifting towards the pads and Dilshan sweeps it powerfully behind square on the leg side for his first boundary
flatter delivery on the off stump and the batsman defends
a loud appeal for an lbw as the batsman attempts the shot from two balls ago and gets hit on the pads, just slipping down leg this time.. but a good ball
quicker on the pads and Dilshan nudges it to backward square leg for a single
he goes back and punches it to long on for a single
good positive stride by KJP as he defends this length delivery to point
another firm drive by the batsman as he punches this on the up to mid off
he gets a thick outside edge to third man as he is a touch late to come forward
length delivery on off, the batsman punches it to short cover
he gives width to the batsman and Dilshan is not going to miss out on those as he slashes this through cover point
corrects his radar and bowls it outside off, Dilshan defends
full and flighted, but on the leg stump line and KJP tucks it to square leg for a single
tossed up and full, Dilshan drives it back to the bowler
works it to backward square leg with the turn
he goes back and punches the flatter delivery to long on for a single
more air this time, but the batsman defends it to midwicket
almost punches it to short cover where Misbah is placed for exactly the shot..
short of length and going away with the angle, Dilshan cuts it hard, but straight to the man at point
length delivery, the batsman pushes it to mid-off and calls for a quick single

oh this is very Jayasuriya-like, it was just a touch fuller on off and KJP slaps it over midwicket with a lot of bottom hand.. The slow outfield tries its best to stop that, but the ball finally is able to reach the rope
back of length this time and the batsman pushes it to cover
oh you give 'em width, you be prepared for the punishment! It's full and wide and again, KJP slaps it over cover point with utter ease
back of length this time on off stump, the batsman rocks back and defends
another sweep shot by Dilshan and he gets it on the middle, down to the backward square leg boundary
flatter delivery on the stumps, it's pushes to mid on for a single
another quicker delivery, it's punched to long on for a single
quick feet Dilshan steps out in no time and lofts it over extra cover for a boundary
goes for another sweep and hit again hit on the pads, loud appeal for lbw and this time as well, Hafeez decides against a review, and rightly so
comes down the pitch and dabs it towards mid on for a single
length delivery on off, it's punched firmly to cover off the front foot
back of length delivery on the pads and it's neatly tucked to fine leg for a single
this has gone past the bat, probably for the first time in this innings?.. It swings away from a length as KJP is drawn into it
this one keeps coming in with the angle and the batsman tucks it to square leg
he tries to punch it through cover, but gets an inside edge to midwicket
he comes forward and pushes it softly toward mid off for a lightening quick single
he tosses it up outside off and Dilshan quickly gets down on his knees and sweeps it to deep square leg boundary. Excellent shot
this one is even better as he charges down the pitch in no time, gets under it and smashes it over the umpire's head

quicker delivery, he chops it to point and calls for a single, but it was straight to the fielder.. Dilshan, what have you done! KJP had no chance as it went straight to the fielder and all Bilawal hits the stumps direct.. Game over for KJP, for no fault of his. Pakistan have a bonus wicket
tossed up and Sanga drives it with a forward stride, straight to cover
flatter and quicker, Sanga defends it with ease
another quicker one and the batsman pushes it to cover
length delivery on off, the batsman comes forward easily and punches it to cover
back of length on off stump, the batsman dabs it to midwicket and calls for another quick one
he gets behind the length delivery solidly and pushes it to point
he allows the ball to come to him, then whips it to midwicket
he looks good at whatever he does, comes forward and solidly defends this to cover
tries to find that tiny gap between cover point and backward point, but fails this time
pushes this one down the leg side
he whips it to backward square leg with the turn, but straight to the fielder
spins in from outside off and the batsman dabs it to point for a single
flighted delivery on off, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
he splits the gap at cover with a firm push to deep extra cover for a couple
he stays behind the line and defends it solidly
he punches this back past the bowler, but has to be sent back by Dilshan as this one went straight to mid on
length delivery on off, the batsman cuts it straight to point
this one beats the outside edge again as Dilshan plays inside the line, it just went away a touch too
he pushes this to wide mid-on for a quick single with a neat push
he comes forward and drives it on the up through cover, but there is protection in the deep
he comes forward and defends the length delivery solidly down the pitch
gets up on his toes and pushes the back of length delivery to deep cover for a single
length delivery on off, the batsman punches it straight to mid-off
another one on a length on off stump, the batsman punches it back to the bowler
slightly short in length and Dilshan cuts it hard, but he is not able to beat the point fielder
tries too hard to punch this one, but gets an inside edge to mid on
full and heading on the middle and leg stump, the batsman hit it to deep square leg off the inside half of his bat
it seemed just a tame push, but Sanga's whip from off stump speeds across the turf through midwicket and heads to the boundary
starts off with a length ball on off, the batsman defends it to cover
comes to the front foot and pushes the length delivery to point
this time, he crunches it through cover point off the front foot, but Pakistan have plugged the deep boundary with a sweeper
a little too quick for the pull shot as Sanga gets a bottom edge on to his pads
he dabs it to mid-on with soft hands and takes a sharp single
he comes forward and punches this to mid-off for another quick single
angled in on to the off stump line, Dilshan comes forward and punches it to mid on
some hesitation as Sanga starts running soon after Dilshan chops it to point. Dilshan was not running at all and Sanga has to turn and dive back quickly

this time there is a direct hit from midwicket and Dilshan could be in trouble! He pulled it straight to midwicket and called for a quick one, but this is disaster for Dilshan as his bat just got stuck before the line and then came off his hands.. The ball strikes the stumps moments later, but Dilshan's bat is out of his hands and he is gone.. What luck! It got stuck into the pitch almost on the line.. One inch forward and Dilshan would have been fine.. Second direct hit from Pakistan, great work there by Hafeez, and second wicket.. this time it's a big one
he bowls it full and wide outside off, the batsman defends it to the bowler
he beats the batsman with one that moves away after pitching, hurrying Sanga with pace and movement there..
goes for a fuller length this time and Sanga drives it straight to cover
he waits in the crease and defends the back of length delivery to the bowler
he whips one to fine leg to get off the mark
shuffles across and tickles it to deep square leg for a single
he stands tall and guides the length delivery to third man for a single
this time he is beaten as Junaid gets one to dart in! It cuts the batsman in half and Junaid goes for an appeal in excitement.. Excellent delivery
he pushes this to wide mid on for a single to keep the strike
he stands tall and pushes the length delivery to cover
another quick delivery from Bhatti, but Sanga is quick to come on the front foot too as he pushes it to cover
doesn't time this push to mid-off, but he calls for a quick single anyway
he comes forward to defend the length delivery to the off side
he defends this one with an open face to the fielder at point
he stays in the crease and punches the back of length delivery to deep cover for a single
not much movement of the feet as he defends this 140 kph back of length delivery to off
he opens the face late to guide this behind point, but hits it straight to the fielder
another quick single attempted to mid on, but Tanvir is a touch slower and Chandimal makes it through in time
he shuffles across and punches the length ball past mid-on's left for a couple of runs
length delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it on the up to deep cover
another batsman takes on the fielder, Anwar Ali at mid-off charges in and flicks an under arm throw, but it doesn't hit the stumps
he bowls it on short of length, 144 kph, the batsman defends it off the back foot
tries to pull it over midwicket, but he is working up some pace and the batsman is a touch late on his shot.. 144 kph again
short and outside off, the batsman wanted to guide it to point but he is beaten by the pace and bounce.. Another one hitting 144 kph
he comes forward and pushes this length ball to mid off
full and heading to the middle stump at 143 kph, the batsman digs it out towards midwicket
slower ball this time, the batsman wanted to pull this one, but it doesn't rise as much as he wanted.. another maiden as he hits it straight to midwicket
he stays rock solid behind the ball as he defends it to mid off
he tries to force this through the leg side, but gets hit on the thigh pad
now Chandimal gets hit on the thighs as he tries to work it away to the leg side
back of length and angling in from round the wicket, Chandimal rocks back and works it away behind square on the leg side
another back of length delivery from Junaid, 142 kph, the batsman punches it down the ground to long on
short delivery, Sanga gets on top of that and rolls his wrists as he plays it down to fine leg
he comes forward and finally gets one off the middle of the bat, but Misbah cuts it off with a dive at cover
short of length, but he looses direction and slips it down the leg side
he stands tall and punches it to the fielder at cover
another good stop by Hafeez at midwicket! This was well timed by the batsman, but Hafeez dives full length to cut off a certain boundary
slightly slower from Bhatti and Sanga pushes it to long off for a single
stands tall and dabs it to point, but no chance of their single as the fielder intercepts it with the agility of a gazelle
he makes room and wanted to send this to the stands, but luckily for him, he doesn't get his timing right as Afridi was waiting there at long on.. The ball drops well short of the fielder

a loud appeal for lbw as Junaid hits the pads from round the stumps, but that was comfortably going over the stumps. Chandimal was looking to play across the line, but that delivery was quick at 142 kph
he comes forward and pushes it to cover
he drives it in the air back down the pitch, but it was just out of the reach of Junaid. The batsmen take a single to mid on
he comes forward and squeezes this past a diving cover fielder for a couple
another tight delivery and Shehzad runs in like a cheetah from point to prevent any chance of a single
he stands tall and calls for a quick single to mid-off. A throw is fired by Anwar Ali at the non-striker's end, but Chandimal is through in time
he bowls this one at 142 kph, the batsman pushes it to long on for a single
nicely done by Sanga as he skips down the track and chips one over the umpire's head for a couple of runs
looks to push it through cover, but he chops it down towards point as Bhatti skids it on

loud appeal for caught behind down the leg side! I heard a sound, as the ball went past the bat. Umar Akmal immediately asks for a review. It was a short delivery and way down the leg side, Sanga went for the pull, but missed it. It was far from anything other than the bat.. So if the noise is there, it has to come from the bat or the glove. There was definitely a clunky noise as the ball went past the bat. It's out for me, but on the evidence of the videos, it's not very clear. I hope they check the sound cues, because there is definitely a noise. There is no Hot Spot or snicko unfortunately.. It is given not out and called a wide.. Umar Akmal is shocked
he pushes this 144 kph delivery down the pitch off the back foot
he doesn't get much timing in his drive, but he manages to push it through the gap at wide mid-off
he pulls it this time as Bhatti bowls it short down the leg side, 145 kph, and the pace carries it all the way over the fine leg boundary for a six
bowls a quick slider which is nudged away to deep backward square leg
he shuffles across and punches the length delivery to wide long on to go past 12000 runs in ODIs
it's full and flighted, Sanga calmly punches it to long on for a single
he comes down the pitch and flicks it towards midwicket, in the air, but it falls short of the fielder
this time he pulls out the slog sweep and smashes it over deep midwicket, this one came off the middle and clears the boundary comfortably
smartly turns the strike over with a neat push to long on
big turn for Ajmal and the batsman tucks it to backward square leg, where Shehzad allows it to go through his legs..sloppy there by the fielder
now he paddles from outside off to fine leg
bowls it flat and gets some purchase from the pitch, but the batsman goes back and punches it down the ground
pushed through on off and Sanga eases it to long off for a single
this time Chandimal pushes it to long on for another easy single
he goes deep into his crease and punches it to deep cover for a single
a touch short by Afridi and it's easily whipped away to fine leg for a single
some drift for Lala, but the batsman punches it to cover
more drift outside off, the batsman chops it to point and calls for a quick one
he comes forward and whips it to deep midwicket for a single
full and on the stumps, the batsman pushes it to long on for a single
he shuffles outside off and comes out of the crease too to whip it to the leg side, but gets hit on the pads
he moves a touch to the leg side and chips it stylishly over cover with a well-placed boundary
fuller delivery from Ajmal, the batsman slices it through cover for a quick single
he tries to paddle it from way outside off, misses and the ball hit him on his chin
quicker delivery on the stumps, pushes Chandimal to the back foot, but he picks up a single with a dab to midwicket
he eases it to long on for a single
comes out of the crease, but he is not close to the pitch of the ball, and defends it back to the bowler
this one skids down the leg side and is called a wide
he corrects his line, the batsman comes forward and defends
only slightly short and Sanga is quick to rock back and pull it to the cow corner boundary
now he unfurls a stylish cover drive that is cut off by a diving cover fielder
he goes back to cut it, but gets an under edge past the wicket keeper
bad delivery this one, but Sanga pulls it straight to short fine leg.. He could have hit it anywhere
he bowls it full and and Sanga now finds the gap at wide mid-off, it's just cut off at the boundary
he stays on the back foot and punches it to long on to get to his half-century, his 82nd in ODIs
he waits in the crease and works it to deep square leg for a single
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman slices it to point
he flicks this straight to midwicket
he comes down the pitch and pushes it back to the bowler, who fires a throw back to the striker's end, but Umar Akmal is blinded by the batsmen is not able to stop.. allows an extra
it's pushed through on the stumps, the batsman flicks it to square leg
this one comes in from outside off, the batsman punches it to wide long on for a single
he comes round the wicket and fires a quicker one, Sanga pushes it back to the bowler
shuffles across the crease to dab it to midwicket, Chandimal charges down the pitch, but Sanga sends him back in time
tossed up delivery and he draws the outside edge of the bat, but this one slips down to the boundary at third man
quicker delivery, the batsman flicks it straight to short fine leg
he comes forward and punches it to long on for a single
he waits on the back foot and punches it to cover
he tries to punch it through cover, but gets an inside edge on to his boots
tossed up delivery on off, it's driven to long off for a single
he shuffles across and dabs it past midwicket
bowls it with a pause, but Sanga punches it to deep cover
tossed up delivery outside off, Sanga pushes it straight to point
fires this one quicker, Sanga moves across the stumps and clips it to fine leg for a single
the batsman tries to paddle one from outside off and gets hit on the body
it's the doosra and Chandimal pushes it back towards Sanga in the air.. Ajmal extends his hands, but it's too far

oh that's the big wicket! Clatter of the stumps as Sanga gets a bottom edge on to the stumps. It was quicker delivery and he wanted to slog sweep it, but missed it. Ajmal is ecstatic, so is Pakistan..

another super delivery from Ajmal! He pushes this through a touch slower, it grips the surface after drawing the batsman forward, beats the outside edge and Umar Akmal takes the bails off in a flash. The umpire wants to check, but Thisara never lifted his foot off the ground
tossed up and full, the batsman drives it to long on for a single
pushed through on the stumps, the batsman whips it to deep midwicket
he gets some width this time and plays it late past the backward point fielder for a well-run three
he stays in the crease and uses the sledgehammer of his bat to punch it to long on
tossed up delivery on the middle and Chandimal takes the single to the right of Misbah at midwicket
quicker delivery on the stumps, it's pushed back to the bowler
he comes round the wicket and bowls a short of length delivery on the stumps, Chandimal clips it to deep square leg for a single
quick delivery at 141 kph, heading towards off stump, but Thisara defends it to midwicket easily
he shuffles across and works the length delivery away to deep square leg for a single

now Junaid strikes to remove the other set batsman! This one was quick from round the wicket, angling in and Chandimal, who was neither forward nor back, was a little late to bring his bat down. He looses his off stump and Pakistan take further control
a good first delivery from Junaid, quick and headed to the off stump, the batsman pushes it to cover for a quick single
he comes over the wicket to the left hander, who pushes it with ease to long on for a single
tossed up on off, the batsman flicks it to square leg for a single
slower and loopy outside off, Angelo comes forward and gets an outside edge to short third man, they take a single
he gets a thick leading edge that floats in the air for a long time.. Hafeez runs to his right, but just drops a meter away from him
firmly pushed back to the bowler and Hafeez makes a good stop
tossed up delivery, a touch slower too, the batsman comes forward and defends
now quicker by Hafeez, "Khud hi (back it up yourself)" says Akmal, as the ball is pushed back to the bowler
bowls a short of length delivery outside off, the batsman is in no hurry and defends it solidly
another back of length delivery to Angelo, who gets a touch squared up, but picks up a single with a soft dab to cover
that's an awesome yorker, but it misses everything, not very far from off stump

this one doesn't miss what it's supposed to hit! It was on a length and Thisara got stuck in the crease, much like Chandimal. The ball cut in after pitching and hit the top of off as the batsman tried to play across the line
he fires this one in from round the wicket, but Kula defends this comfortably off the front foot
he didn't know where that went as he tried to clip it to the leg side, but got hit on the thigh pad. It was on the off side and Junaid ran in to field that
he bowls a quicker one that is defended to midwicket
he stays on the back foot and flicks it to deep square leg for a single
it flicks the pads and rolls down fine on the leg side.. Kula was looking for the ball, while Angelo had run halfway down.. they comes back for a second later as there was no one in that area
tries to push it to midwicket and the leading edge almost carries back to the bowler
now gets hit on the pads and picks up a leg bye to square leg
quicker delivery on off stump, the batsman just calmly defends that
another quick delivery that the batsman tucks to midwicket before he scampers through for a single
he moves to the leg side and slaps the length delivery back on to Junaid's ankle.. He is gone down with pain and the shoes are off. The Physio comes out again
he bowls this one with a limp, but it's not short of intensity. The batsman pushes it to cover for a quick single
on the pads and it's flicked straight to short fine leg, Ajmal form there fires a throw and could have had Kula definitely had he hit
he moves to the leg side and that is some awesome hit by Kula, just a swing of the bat, and it was short of length, so rising too.. Slapped over long on and into the stands
he gets a vicious yorker and is hit on the toe, but the umpire reckons that was heading down leg
he makes room and pushes it straight to cover
quicker delivery on the stumps, the batsman can only defends it down the pitch
he shuffles across the dab it to midwicket and wants a single, but Angelo turns him down
he goes on the back foot and works this away to deep square leg for a single
fires this one on the stumps and the batsman is not able to get it out of the pitch
another quick delivery and the batsman can't do much about it, he defends it to midwicket
he comes round the wicket and bowls it full, the batsman punches it past the stumps for a couple
he finds the boundary at fine leg as Tanvir is slightly leg side with his yorker.. Maqsood dives and makes a good attempt, but is not able to keep it in
yes, no, yes, no, but they decide to take the single to extra cover finally
oh wow! Kula smashes the leather off the ball with that drive! He made room by moving outside leg and clatters it through extra cover
he inside edges this to his pads as he tries to clip it to the leg side
slower delivery this time, the batsman waits before nudging it to square leg for a single. Sri Lanka's 200 is up
he finds the gap at extra cover again with a beautiful inside out drive over the infield..No half measures there by Kula
he bowls a slider that Kula dabs to midwicket for a single
they pick up a quick single to cover as the batsman plays it with soft hands
full and on the stumps, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
quicker and shorter delivery, the batsman nudges it to midwicket for a single
tossed up delivery on the middle stump, it's driven with ease to long on
he bowls it on the pads and that is flicked to deep backward square leg for a single
he bowls a low full toss and the batsman manages to slice it between short third man and backward point. Not sure if he intended to hit it there, but it certainly fetches him four important runs
another full toss, but Kula, who was giving the bowler a charge, manages to just push it to long on

he bowls a good slower delivery, the batsman dabs it to point and calls for a quick single.. But there is no one backing at the non-striker's end and they take a second..Misbah is not impressed with Shehzad's throw
length delivery on the stumps, it is pushed to long on for a single..But, hello, he has cut the line on the side as he went too wide
it's a slower ball and this has been given the anti-gravity treatment, miles high and deep into the stands at deep midwicket.. It's the biggest hit today.. Long way into the stands
it's pushed down the leg side and Umar Akmal has to dive across the half stop that
length delivery on off, the batsman calmly nudges it to square leg for a single
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to long off for a single
he wanted to send this to the moon, but gets hit on the pads.. Lala appeals, the batsmen run along .. the throw from point gives away an overthrow..
Lala strikes! He slowed this down as Kula came out of the crease, misses it completely and Akmal does the rest. Respite from Kula attack. Lala is pumped after that wicket
that was a quick delivery from Lala, 131 kph, outside off and I don't think the batsman saw that coming.. He is beaten
this time it's a full delivery and Prasanna slaps it over extra cover for a boundary.. What a way to make your first contact!

he wanted to launch this to the top of the roof, but gets too much under it and sends it high in the night sky.. It descends towards midwicket, where there is no one. Lala runs with his arms spread out, but those ones are always difficult.. He doesn't even get a hand. Prasanna survives..
he starts off with a short of length delivery that is tucked to square leg for a quick single
more yes and no! Angelo wanted to get to the striker's end. Prasanna wasn't moving and rightly so, the ball was straight at the hands of cover.. Angelo gets back in time
another one for Junaid! He hits middle and leg this time. It was quick and straight and the batsman had no chance against that. Junaid is in a dangerous mood.. Lala comes and joins him in being angry

another good delivery, too quick.. The bowler goes on and on in his appeal.. but there was a big inside edge.. the batsman started moving, the fielder from cover ran in and had a chance to run him out.. but the ball misses and they take a single.. Frantic times
attempts a yorker, but Angelo drives it to deep extra cover for a quick couple
he plays it smartly with soft hands to cover and calls for a quick single
he tucks this one behind square to pick up a single
he comes forward and opens the face to push it to point for a single
oh an interesting choice of shot as Angelo goes for a reverse sweep, finds the fielder at short third man
he misses out again as the ball turns in enough to beat the bat and hit the pads
tossed up and slower, the batsman doesn't have a clue, so he just defends it
this time he smartly nudges it to point for a single
bowls a short ball that is well played by Angelo, he rolls his wrists on it and plays it in the gap at deep backward square leg
short ball again, now Dimuth pulls it to deep backward square leg easily for a couple of runs
full delivery on the pads, Dimuth flicks it to deep backward square leg again and they come back for three

oh he is lucky that this aerial shot lands in vacant space! He flicked this in the air, but just got too much of a bat on that and it descended between the deep square leg fielder and the wide long on one..
full delivery, that is firmly hit to mid-off

oh what! Dimuth goes all the way to the off side to lap it over his shoulder, but takes his eyes off, gets hit on the back of his bat, and the ball deflects past the keeper for a boundary, between his legs, not far from off stump... Pheww
he easily pushes it to point for a single, but the fielder at point fires a throw. Junaid it is.. Ajmal is not able to collect.. they run a second
now Angelo calmly pushes it to long on
bowls a good ball on off, some extra bounce on that too.. Dimuth dabs it to off side and calls for a quick single
they are not taking any risks off Ajmal. Angelo dabs it to the leg side and takes off for an easy one
oh good ball, this one kept coming in to the left-hander and he inside edges it between his legs
now he tries to go for a sweep on one that is well outside off, misses it completely
he bowls this one wide outside off! Angelo was making room and had to stretch to play that, he bunts it to off
this time he punches it to extra cover for a single
bowls it tight on the stumps, the batsman wanted to pull it to the leg side, but gets a bottom edge on to his thigh pad. they run a single to square leg though
he flicks that with the angle to the leg side, but that is hit straight to short fine leg.. A meter here or a meter there, it was surely a boundary
a good slower delivery by Tanvir, Dimuth is too early on his pull and gets hit on the thigh pad.. they run a single off the deflection
full delivery on the stumps, the batsman can only flick it to deep square leg, just a single
fires a quick yorker, but it's a low full toss that is punched to wide long on for a couple
a quick short ball that is hit only as far as midwicket. A throw is fired to the non-striker's end. Angelo dives to get in. A direct hit would have made the match interesting..
oye! That slips from Junaid's hands, it's a beamer. Just over the waist and it hits the batsman on his gloves..It's a no-ball
he pushes this one straight to cover, but takes off early for a single
full delivery outside off, the batsman has a swing but he gets an inside edge to the leg side, towards midwicket, it's an easy single
he charges down the pitch and is that the killer blow? possibly.. he hits it over the extra cover fielder and finds the boundary
comes down the pitch again, this time he pushes it to long on for a single
Afridi roaaaaaaarsssss! who cares if the delivery was a  long hop! It's a pressure situation and Angelo fluffs his chance, he slaps it straight to midwicket. Jinxed, some would say..
he gets a full delivery outside off that he crashes to deep point for a couple
short and quick outside off, Sena cuts, but straight to point.. no single
but Sena does it! He has made sure Angelo's and Sanga's effort is not in vain. Cuts it fine between backward point and short third man for the winning runs
